amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike the first paragraph of title IV. In its entirety, title IV provides funds for Overseas Contingency Operations for the Department of Defense.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to strike the pending paragraph pertaining to the Military Construction, Navy and Marine Corps.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Van Hollen amendment (A016) Failed by recorded vote: 191 - 229, 1 Present (Roll no. 184).

action.text: Amendment (A016) offered by Mr. Van Hollen.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
